verbs.description: The only thing that [V: will] fix the damage the Trump administration has done to the US relationship with its closest allies is a change of guard in the US government , according to Sebastian Mallaby at the " Council on Foreign Relations . "

[ARG0: The only thing] [R-ARG0: that] [ARGM-MOD: will] [V: fix] [ARG1: the damage the Trump administration has done to the US relationship with its closest allies] is a change of guard in the US government , according to Sebastian Mallaby at the " Council on Foreign Relations . "

The only thing that will fix the damage the Trump administration [V: has] done to the US relationship with its closest allies is a change of guard in the US government , according to Sebastian Mallaby at the " Council on Foreign Relations . "

The only thing that will fix [ARG1: the damage] [ARG0: the Trump administration] has [V: done] [ARG2: to the US relationship with its closest allies] is a change of guard in the US government , according to Sebastian Mallaby at the " Council on Foreign Relations . "

[ARG1: The only thing that will fix the damage the Trump administration has done to the US relationship with its closest allies] [V: is] [ARG2: a change of guard in the US government] , [ARGM-ADV: according to Sebastian Mallaby at the " Council on Foreign Relations] . "

The only thing that will fix the damage the Trump administration has done to the US relationship with its closest allies is a change of guard in the US government , [V: according] to Sebastian Mallaby at the " Council on Foreign Relations . "
